original_title: UNP Colombo East Bala mandala meeting...
original_body_lines: UNP Colombo East 'Bala Mandala' meeting was held in Kirulapone today (22) with the participation of Senior Presidential Advisor Sagala Ratnayake. The meeting was organized by UNP Kirulapone Organiser Titus Perera. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
